body.name: BOGASING Bluetooth Speakers, M5 Portable Wireless Speaker with 40W Loud Stereo Sound & Punchy Bass, 30H Playtime, IPX7 Waterproof, Bluetooth 5.3, EQ, TWS, TF-Card, AUX, USB, for Outdoor Home Shower
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 mins
Or fastest pickup Wednesday, February 14. Order within 3 mins
features: 【40W All-Around Sound】M5 wireless bluetooth speaker is equipped with dual high-sensitivity drivers and dual passive radiators, pumping high-definition sound from all directions, bringing you an amazing 360° surround sound field, immersive Sound allows you have a deeper connection to your music. Simultaneously output BOGASING enhanced bass, get lost in the thundering bass, detailed mids, and crystal-clear highs.

【Three Audio Sounds】Benefit from three sound effect modes of exclusive custom by BOGASING, which help you feel 3D Stereo, clear and undistorted vocals or powerful deep bass. Portable bluetooth equalizer speakers meet your listening preferences and provide you with more listening pleasure! !

【Fully Waterproof】The rated of IPX7 waterproof protection defends bluetooth speaker wireless against all kinds of dust, snow, downpours and spills, which is perfect for showering, hiking and camping. The rugged portable bluetooth speakers is ready for anything in everywhere.

【Non-Stop Battery Life】BOGASING bluetooth speakers synergizes enhanced battery and latest power management technology for up to 30 hours of sublime audio. With its compact size and soft touch, it is easy to hold in your hand and take it with you wherever you go for a whole day.

【Top Bluetooth 5.3 Version】The outdoor speaker adopts advanced Bluetooth 5.3 technology, which provides a faster and more stable bluetooth connection within a normal range of 60 feet. The wide compatibility allows you to connect your smartphone, computer, TV and PC in seconds. It also supports TF card, USB flash drive and AUX input.

【True Wireless Stereo Pairing】For huge stereo sound and double the volume, pair two M5 Bluetooth speakers. TWS technology provides independent left and right sound channels, allowing you to truly enjoy the surround sound of the theater.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BOGASING M5 - Portable Bluetooth Speakers ✔ 40W stereo audio with bomming bass ✔ 3 Sound Modes (3D Stereo/ Vocal/ Super bass) ✔ True Wireless Stereo - Double the Volume & Bold Stereo Sound ✔ 4 Playback Modes (Bluetooth 5.3/ TF card/ AUX-IN/ USB Flash Drive) ✔ Charging Port: USB-C (It does not support playback through USB-C but only charging) ✔ 360° Surround Sound (Dual Full Frequency Drivers plus Dual Passive Radiators) ✔ 6000mAh Large-Capacity Battery, Up to 30 Hours of Playtime on a Single Charge. ✔ Equipped with Exclusive DSP Technology, Maximize Your Horizons of Sound Experience. ✔ Built-in Microphone - For personal Handsfree Speakerphone Calls from a Cellphone or iPhone ect.

40W Excellent Audio Performance Benefits from the BOGASING M5 Bluetooth Speakers, it is equipped with the latest technology dual audio drivers and two passive radiators to ensure a remarkable sound in any direction, with excellent clarity and zero distortion, and immerse you in the music.

Suitable for Every Music Genre The BOGASING M5 wireless speaker offers three different sound modes, so it getting worth when it comes to sound technology. Find the ideal sound setting for your ears by switching between Vocal, Super bass or 3d Stereo modes. Therefore, the speaker is perfect for any music genre - electronic, hip-hop, rock, jazz, classical or audiobook.

Amplified Audio & Intensified Bass Dual full-range speakers and dual passive radiators placed in front of and behind the speakers allow it to effortlessly fill your room with every detail of your music. Meanwhile, an upgraded hi-fi system with punchy bass, tight mids and crystal-clear highs for optimal sound quality in any orientation or environment. Excellent Connectivity Adopt Bluetooth 5.3 technology to optimize device compatibility and connection speed, enjoy seamless music streaming with the stable Bluetooth connection. M5 also has all the necessary ports, such as USB flash drive, TF card and AUX-IN port. NOTE: Type-C port does not support playback but only charging. Extended Playtime LED indicators will notify you of battery status and charge. Under normal conditions, a full charge can play up to 30 hours, depending on usage, sometimes battery life will vary, such as volume, music genre and music source. *10%-30% volume, 30 hours playtime *40%-60% volume, 20 hours playtime *70%-100% volume, 10 hours playtime

Powerful performance for any occasion The M5 speaker allows you to listen to your music while camping or hiking, or even while taking a shower or enjoying a sunset on the patio. Whatever or wherever you have planned to, the BOGASING M5 delivers the sound you prefer and the portability you need.

Compact And Powerful BOGASING M5 outdoor speaker can absorb a fall and withstand being tossed around. It has a rubberised silicone exterior that resists drops, dents, cracks and scratches. And the compact size allows it to fit in a small space or bag. Also perfect for listening anywhere liquids are within reach - IPX7 waterproof provides protection from the inside out, so it's a perfect companion on any adventure, even in the rain or inclement weather. Just get into the action with bold sound NOW!!

M5 S8 Pro M4 - Black M4 - Pink M10 - Black Sound Power 40 Watts 60 Watts 40 Watts 40 Watts 15 Watts Sound performance Brilliant 360° omnidirectional sound Hi-Fi premium stereo sound Clear, powerful stereo sound with deeper Bass Clear, powerful stereo sound with deeper Bass Small but powerful sound Number of drives 2 x full-range drivers 2 x full-range drivers & 2 x tweeters 2 x full-range drivers 2 x full-range drivers 1 x full-range driver Passive radiator 2 Passive radiator 1 Passive radiator 1 Passive radiator 1 Passive radiator 1 Passive radiator Water Resistance IPX7 IPX5 IPX7 IPX7 IPX7 True Wireless Stereo ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Built-in Mic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ EQ (3 sound effects) ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ X Connection method Bluetooth 5.3/TF/AUX/USB-Stick Bluetooth/TF/AUX/USB-C Bluetooth/TF/AUX/USB-C Bluetooth/TF/AUX/USB-C Bluetooth/TF/AUX/USB-C Dimensions 16 x 7.1 x 7.6 cm 27.1 x 5.3 x 7.3 cm 21.4 x 6.3 x 8 cm 21.4 x 6.3 x 8 cm 10 x 10 x 5.8 cm

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I tested this M5 model against the Tribit Maxsound Plus, twin 20 watt (total 40 watts) paired cannister style speakers, and a third 24 watt well rated speaker. No contest! The Bogasing M5 was the clear (and I do mean CLEAR ) winner. This little speaker is loud enough for any room, and the bass tones are crisp and clean all the way up to max volume! And that's without using the bass boost!!! This speaker took a victory lap, then competed against a 60 watt, quad speaker - a Miatone boom box (called an XBOX). It came in second in volume and bass (no surprise), but actually beat the Miatone behemoth in clarity, richness and tonal separation, battery life, portability, toughness (water, dust, shock protection) and connectivity options. The M5 plays via Bluetooth, 3.5mm aux in cable, Micro SD card (TF card), and USB in (flashdrive, cable, etc.)! It's fair to say I've just purchased my new favorite speaker! I think this very compact unit is UNDER PRICED and can easily compete in the $80 - $120 category. An amazing sound for an even more amazing price!Added July 27, 2023:One thing I noticed in many of the other reviews on YouTube (and other places), is there seems to be some confusion as to how to achieve stereo separation with the drivers located "front and back." To automatically get the correct left and right channel separation, simply turn the short end (without the accessory door) towards the listener! This puts the left and right channels in correct alignment. Or, one can simply stand the speaker up on that same short end and the drivers will be pumping out excellent stereo to the left and right of the listener. It's not a problem at all, but in fact, it's a DESIGN FEATURE that allows the user to change the amount of separation sound by simply adjusting the placement of the M5!! This is impossIble to achieve on any other single unit. Way to go Bogasing!RobUpdate 8/7/2023:I'm so pleased with this little speaker, that I purchased a second M5 to try out the TWS (true wireless stereo) feature. The ability to employ two separated speakers (mine are now about 10 ft. apart) not only doubled the output, but created a surround sound experience that I didn't expect from such tiny speakers. It pulls you INTO the music in a way that's hard to describe. I appreciate the stereo effect from a single M5 speaker, but this is an immersive experience on another level entirely. It's so easy to pair them once, then that's it. You can turn them off, on, off, come back days later, it doesn't matter - they're paired together like two wolves in the wild!Because it's all wireless, I've had a lot of fun moving them around the house, and found a great spot on the floor that amplified the bass dramatically. So far they've performed flawlessly, and I'm so glad I didn't "cheap out" (my default setting) and stop with a single speaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good sound at an affordable price
reviews.reviewText: Very, very pleased with this BT speaker.Very good sound that IMHO, rivals the Bose speakers, but for 1/3 the price.While Bose has nice sound, you pay a lot more for the name, as I own and have owned many Bose products in the last 20 years, so I can speak to that objectively.That being said, I also cannot discern the difference in sound quality between this Bogasing speaker to the 2 Bose speakers in this category, either.The Bogasing sounds the same to me, and with a far better battery life and at 1/3 the price, why pay more for the Bose name?Bogasing makes affordable speakers that have excellent battery life, very good sound, and also has something that Bose produces do not have, which is an available 3.5mm jack for connecting radios and phones to when you can't use Bluetooth as an option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Bluetooth Speaker For The Money
reviews.reviewText: I cannot begin to describe how impressive the sound is--the richness of the bass messes with my head, like it is impossible to get bass like that from such a tiny little thing. But it does.And it projects the sound very nicely outside with surprizingly nuanced stereo effect. The battery lasts overnight easily and charges very quickly.I've had this one for a few months now and I am still so impressed that I just bought another one for my son.From what I understand they can be connected in tandem, so I look forward to hearing the stereo effect of two combined units. I might actually buy another one just to have two for myself.Again, great product for a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sound for the Price
reviews.reviewText: Not an audiophile, but I was looking for a speaker that was loud and had great sound without breaking the bank. This didn't disappoint, fills my kitchen nicely and pretty clear if I listen to podcasts. Design is a little rip off of the Marshal speaker but I don't care. Haven't put the water resistance to the test.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Good For A Small Enclosure
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy box with good weight and insulating materials. Sound quality was very good, but lacking that full rich thump that comes with a bigger enclosure. If you want small, this is a great choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really great for the price
reviews.reviewText: Bought 4 of these for an event at my job (multi floor space). Great sound and was really loud which is what we needed. Was able to buy USBs so we didn’t have to worry about Bluetooth and worked just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A very nice portable speaker that’s both loud and portable.
reviews.reviewText: I own an Anker Soundcore XL outdoor speaker (16 watt) that I purchased in 2016. It was a top-of-the-line portables speaker in its day. This new unit by Bogasing far surpasses it. It’s loud, clear, and last for up to 30 hours of playtime. It also has multiple play modes. I considered newly released Bose and Soundcore speakers but they were more $$$$. I’m very happy with this unit and would recommend highly to anyone considering a portable speaker that they want great sound from!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Was happy - but stuck in blue tooth mode
reviews.reviewText: Great sound for a little speaker. I bought it specifically to play music from a USB. It worked once, and now it will not recognize anything but blue tooth, no matter how many times I've reset it. None of my USBs will play.I sent an email to Customer Service (there is no phone number) and am awaiting a response. If anyone has any suggestions, please feel free. If i do not hear back, will be returning.
Es mi bocina compacta favorita por su sonido equilibrado y potente para ser tan pequeña.Le da guerra a las marcas de prestigio
Very impressed with the sound quality of this little speaker. The price is certainly right and I highly recommend this to anyone looking for something small yet full of great sound quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: With better known makes removing features, such as the auxiliary input, and increasing the size of their speakers, it's refreshing to find a brand that has ADDED features – ability to play from a micro SD card – and maintained a miniscule form factor.The M5 bluetooth speaker from BOGASING is compact, easy to carry and sounds amazing. Until I bought it, I'd always sworn by the ones with model names such as Motion, Boost, Boom, and Flare, but having seen some favourable reviews, I decided it was time to 'drop anchor' (<== see what I did there?!) and take a chance on the BOGASING.Amazing. The sound this diminutive device produces is astonishingly good. In the default 3d sound mode, the base is clear and strong, does not overwhelm more intricate frequencies, and does not sound unnatural.I am in awe of how much sound such a small speaker can produce, and the quality of the sound. Fantastic value.

reviews.reviewTitle: ポータブルなのに低価格で音質もいい。
reviews.reviewText: 購入を決めた動機は二台揃えればステレオフォニックが可能である。それと、スピーカーの配置が前後に有るから向きに縛れない。ブルトゥース接続後片側のスピーカーでもう一つのスピーカーの電源もシンクロしてOFFになる。
